website.name: Tecso Team
website.description: Tecso Team is a leading Iranian software development company specializing in modern web applications, mobile development, UI/UX design, and digital transformation services. Founded by expert developers and based in Tehran, Iran, we serve businesses across the Middle East region including Iran, Iraq, Turkey, and Azerbaijan.

serviceAreas.area: Primary market - Local Iranian businesses and startups
Regional expansion - Iraqi enterprises and government projects
Strategic market - Turkish tech companies and cross-border initiatives
Emerging market - Azerbaijani businesses and regional partnerships

member.name: Sobhan Azimzadeh
member.title: CEO & Founder
member.expertise: Vue.js Development, Business Strategy, Project Management, Full-Stack Development
member.experience: Senior software developer with extensive experience in modern web technologies and business leadership
member.responsibilities: Strategic planning, client relationships, technical architecture decisions, team leadership

member.experience: Creative designer specializing in user-centered design and modern interface development
member.responsibilities: Design systems, user research, interface design, brand identity, usability testing

member.name: Sajjad Manafi
member.title: Backend Engineer

member.experience: Backend specialist focusing on high-performance server applications and scalable systems

service.name: Custom Web Applications
service.description: Modern, responsive web applications built with Vue.js, Nuxt.js, and other cutting-edge technologies
service.technologies: Vue.js, Nuxt.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, SCSS
service.deliverables: Responsive design, SEO optimization, performance optimization, cross-browser compatibility

service.name: E-commerce Platforms
service.description: Complete online store solutions with payment integration, inventory management, and admin panels
service.technologies: Vue.js, Nuxt.js, Stripe, PayPal, REST APIs, Database Integration
service.deliverables: Shopping cart, payment processing, order management, inventory tracking, analytics dashboard

service.name: Progressive Web Apps
service.description: App-like web experiences with offline functionality, push notifications, and mobile optimization
service.technologies: PWA, Service Workers, Manifest, Vue.js, Workbox
service.deliverables: Offline functionality, push notifications, app-like experience, mobile optimization

service.name: API Development
service.description: RESTful and GraphQL APIs built with Go for high-performance server applications
service.technologies: GoLang, REST API, GraphQL, JSON, Database Integration
service.deliverables: Scalable APIs, documentation, testing, security implementation, performance optimization

service.name: Microservices Architecture
service.description: Scalable microservices solutions for enterprise applications and complex systems
service.technologies: GoLang, Docker, Kubernetes, Message Queues, Load Balancing
service.deliverables: Service decomposition, containerization, orchestration, monitoring, scaling strategies

service.name: Database Design
service.description: Efficient database architecture and optimization for high-performance applications
service.technologies: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Database Migration, Query Optimization
service.deliverables: Schema design, indexing strategies, performance tuning, backup solutions, security implementation

service.name: Cross-Platform Apps
service.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android
service.technologies: React Native, Flutter, Native Development, App Store Deployment
service.deliverables: Mobile apps, app store submission, testing, maintenance, updates

service.name: Mobile-First Design
service.description: Mobile-optimized designs and responsive layouts for all screen sizes
service.technologies: Responsive Design, Mobile UX, Touch Interface, Performance Optimization
service.deliverables: Mobile wireframes, responsive layouts, touch-friendly interfaces, performance optimization

service.name: UI/UX Design
service.description: User-centered design focusing on usability, accessibility, and modern aesthetics
service.technologies: Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, Principle, InVision, User Research Tools
service.deliverables: Wireframes, prototypes, design systems, user testing, accessibility compliance

service.name: Brand Identity
service.description: Complete brand identity development including logos, color schemes, and brand guidelines
service.technologies: Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, Brand Strategy, Visual Identity
service.deliverables: Logo design, brand guidelines, color palette, typography, marketing materials

service.name: SEO Optimization
service.description: Search engine optimization for improved visibility and organic traffic
service.technologies: Technical SEO, Content Strategy, Analytics, Schema Markup
service.deliverables: SEO audit, optimization strategy, content recommendations, performance tracking

service.name: Performance Analytics
service.description: Website performance monitoring and optimization for better user experience
service.technologies: Google Analytics, Performance Monitoring, A/B Testing, User Behavior Analysis
service.deliverables: Analytics setup, performance reports, optimization recommendations, conversion tracking

frontend.framework: Primary frontend framework for building interactive user interfaces
Full-stack framework for Vue.js applications with SSR/SSG capabilities
frontend.language: Core programming language for web development
Typed superset of JavaScript for better code quality
frontend.styling: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development

backend.framework: Fast HTTP web framework for Go
backend.database: NoSQL database for flexible data storage
backend.cache: In-memory data structure store for caching

tools.version_control: Version control system for code management

design.approach: Design methodology focused on user needs
